full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DMIGS BRTZE MA'I CHOS SKOR LAS BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR LA BRTEN NAS MTSON BSRUNG BA DBEN SA PAS MDZAD PA, DGA' LDAN LHA BRGYA MA'I DMAR KHRID ZHAL SHES 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PAS MDZAD PA, BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR GYI KHRID YIG TZINTA MA nI'I PHRENG BA, 'PHO BA TSIGS BCAD MA, 'PHO BA TSIGS LHUGS DGA' LDAN BGROD PA'I BDE LAM RNAMS 'JAM DBYANGS BDE BA'I RDO RJES MDZAD PA BCAS BZHUGS SO, , *, ,BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR LA BRTEN NAS MTSON BSRUNG BA DBEN SA PAS MDZAD PA NI,
